translation.why_choose_description: We are the largest online Auction Company in the world processing over 14,000 vehicles a day. We will place your vehicle out for bid to get the highest guaranteed price from over 700,000 buyers worldwide.
translation.30_Mint: By giving us 30 minutes we will get you a fair market value for your vehicle

translation.code_confirmation: QuikAuction.com may send me text messages regarding the sale of my vehicle. Message and data rates pay apply.

translation.paper_desc: This can include Title, Salvage Title, Dublication Title, or Lien sale papers.
translation.sign_up_save_history: Sign up to save your vehicle history?
translation.notice_desc: Your vehicle has been placed on a 30-minute auction and you have 60 buyers reviewing your vehicle now. You will be receiving a guaranteed bid waiting for your approval shortly.
translation.images_desc: You will need to take at least 5 photos of the vehicle if you wish to place it in the auction
translation.hey_there_desc: We're here to make it easier to buy and sell cars in any condition, running or not. This should take less than 1 minute.

translation.felt_experience: Let us know how you felt about your experience:
translation.want_to_sell: Want to sell your car sooner?
translation.good_news: Good news, you received a guaranteed bid for your Astra!
translation.zip_code_appologies: We apologize, but it seems that provided zip code is not active for listings, Our team is constantly working to expand our coverage, and your zip code may become available for searching in future.
translation.initial_setup_message: Thank you for being a QuikAuction buyer. We're rapidly expanding service, and will notify you when listings in you  area go live.
translation.ref_contact: Please verify your control number on Pick Up.
translation.ref_num_desc: The purchasing company will contact you to arrange pick up and payment shortly.
translation.home_heading_desc: No matter the age, mileage or condition of your vehicle we'll pay top market value.
translation.title_desc: Acceptable forms include; Title, Salvage Title, Dublication Title, or Lien sale papers.
translation.noti_desc: A company will be contacting you for time of pick up and payment of your vehicle.
translation.ist_card: A member of our team will call you within two working hours to confirm all the details you’ve provided
translation.second_card: We’ll arrange free collection of your vehicle within 72 hours at a time and date convenient for you
translation.third_card: Our transport team will impact your vehicle on collection and transfer the money to your bank instantly
translation.login_desc: Sign in to your buyer account

translation.signup_seller_main_heading: I WANT TO BE A QUIKAUCTION SELLER
translation.sign_up_buyer_desc: QuikAuction is accepting buyers that are part of the Copart buyer network. Please enter your Copart member email below to get started
translation.sign_up_buyer_verification_desc: We sent a verification code to the email address you entered. Please enter it here. if you did not receive the code, you can request a new one.
translation.name: User Name
translation.do_you_have_account: Do not have an account yet?
translation.eligibility_requirements_description: In order to be a QuikAuction buyer, you much have completed the following steps with Copart:
translation.eligibility_requirements_bottom_note: When you've completed these steps, you can return to complete your registration.
translation.lorem: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.
translation.minimum_bid_desc: As a dismantler, you have the opportunity to enroll in our minimum bidding program. Should you choose to enroll, bids will be submitted on your behalf automatically according to the bid preferences you choose. You'll be able to set a daily limit if desired. You’ll also received notifications if you’ve been outbid when a 15 minute auction goes live, giving you the opportunity to return and increase your bid.
translation.enter_otp: Please enter the 6-digit OTP code that was sent to
translation.code_valid_for: The code is valid for 60 sec
translation.agree_info: To agree place a checkmark in the box provided
translation.how_work_for_picking_vehicle: How it works for picking up your vehicle
translation.read_conditions: I have read and agree to the conditions stated above
translation.read_agreement_error: Please confirm your acceptance of the terms by marking the checkbox next to each item
translation.setting_profile: Lets finish setting up your vehicle search profile
translation.max_distance: Maximum distance you will travel to a acquire a vehicle:
translation.number_info: In order to receive updates about your vehicle, including your guaranteed offers, we'll need to collect and verify your phone number.
translation.start_info_and_company_number: Look for text messages that begin with
translation.buyer_agreement_1: This platform operates as a sealed bid auction. You have a single opportunity to place a bid on the vehicle within a 15-minute window. The highest bidder when the 15 minutes elapse will secure the bid.
translation.buyer_agreement_2: All vehicles are subject to a "bid to be approved" process. QuikAuction will notify you if your bid is the winning one, and confirmation will follow once the bid is approved.
translation.buyer_agreement_3: For your first 3 vehicle purchases within the initial 30 day period that your account is active, there will be no buyer fees associated with vehicles that you win.
translation.buyer_agreement_4: Once you are fully established in your designated geographic area and your profile is active, QuikAuction will begin sending you daily leads for multiple vehicles, complete with images for your review.
translation.buyer_agreement_5: When a vehicle is listed for the 15-minute auction, you will receive a text message at the phone number you entered in your profile. The message will include the year, make and model of the vehicle, and approximate distance. You can view the vehicle details to submit your bid.
translation.buyer_agreement_6: Once your bid is received, if it stands as the highest offer, it will be presented to the seller for approval. If they decline, it will result in a no-sale.
translation.buyer_agreement_7: If the seller accepts your bid, you will receive prompt notification with the necessary information to arrange the pickup and payment for the vehicle with the seller.
translation.buyer_agreement_8: With an active buyer account, you’ll be able to view open listings, vehicles you’ve bid on, and the details about them conveniently in your dealer dashboard.
translation.buyer_agreement_9: You will have 15 minutes from the moment you receive your 'text lead notice' to specify your desired bid amount within the vehicle details screen.
translation.buyer_agreement_10: Upon being awarded the vehicle, it is essential to arrange its pickup within 24 hours or as agreed upon with the customer.
translation.buyer_agreement_11: Buyer fees will be charged automatically. In the event of a sale not occurring after a fee has been charged, you can reach out to QuikAuction support to request a credit for that listing.
translation.buyer_agreement_12: Your account has been verified with Copart, including your enrollment in ePay; enabling the immediate withdrawal of buyer fees only upon seller high bid approval.
translation.buyer_agreement_13: IMPORTANT: FAILURE TO PICK UP Failure to retrieve and pay for the vehicle within 24 hours or as agreed upon with the customer may result in the forfeiture of your QuikAuction leads and Copart privileges.
translation.buyer_agreement_14: If you do not win the high bid, you will receive a notification informing you of the winning bid amount, which may provide helpful insight for future bids.
translation.buyer_agreement_15: Buyers will have the option to customize notification hours, ensuring they receive alerts only during their preferred times. Vehicles listed overnight will be queued for auction at the beginning of the next business day, and buyers will receive a notification as the auctions go live.
translation.something_went_wrong_while_sending_code: Something went wrong while sending code!
translation.something_went_wrong_while_creating_sell: Something went wrong while creating seller!
translation.something_went_wrong_while_updating_buye: ¡Algo salió mal al actualizar el perfil del comprador!

translation.please_enter_valid_max_pickup_distance: Please enter valid max pickup distance
translation.max_pickup_desc: This is the maximum distance ‘as the crow flies’ that you're willing to travel to acquire a vehicle. Only listings that fall within this straight-line range will be shown.
translation.daily_minimum_bid_desc: Would you like to set a daily win limit for minimum bids? If set, we'll only submit bids until you have won at least that many listings per day.
translation.i_have_read_and_agree: I have read and agree to the QuikAuction
translation.forgot_password_desc: Enter your email address and we'll send you an email with instructions to reset your password.
translation.reset_password_desc: Enter your new password to reset your password.
translation.phone_number_step_desc: We will notify you via SMS when new listings go live in your area. Please enter the number where you would like to receive notifications.
translation.phone_number_step_sub_desc: By entering and verifying your phone number, you consent to receive SMS messages from QuickAuction
translation.otp_verification_desc: We sent a verification code to the phone number you entered. Please enter it here. If you did not receive the code, you can request a new one.
translation.listing_types_sub_heading: At launch, only standard road vehicles such as cars and trucks will be listed for sale. If you're interested in other types of listings, please select them below to let us know.
translation.years_below_1980_message: When selecting a year prior to 1981, All Makes and Models are required
translation.please_enter_max_pickup: Please enter max pickup distance in step 1
translation.distance_must_be_less: Distance must be less than your max pickup distance currently set to
